name: @nstudio/nativescript-camera-plus
description: An advanced, embeddable camera for NativeScript.

scripts.link: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link @nstudio/nativescript-camera-plus && cd ../src
scripts.nuke: rm -rf node_modules && cd ../demo && rm -rf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../demo-ng && rm -rf hooks node_modules platforms
scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ios.device: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run ios
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm run preparedemong && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.ios.device: npm run preparedemong && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.android.device: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && tns run android
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm run preparedemong && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.android.device: npm run preparedemong && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: cd ../demo && tns plugin remove @nstudio/nativescript-camera-plus && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.preparedemong: cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove @nstudio/nativescript-camera-plus && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.setup: npm i && cd ../demo && npm i && cd .. && cd ../demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
